title: Asia fears a trade war over planned U.S. trade tax
text:
Asia fears a trade war over planned U.S. trade tax 11:11am GMT - 01:44 
Asian countries are speaking out about their concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump's planned tariffs on steel and aluminum, including the risk of retaliatory measures, as exporters look for more details on the plans. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Asian countries are speaking out about their concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump's planned tariffs on steel and aluminum, including the risk of retaliatory measures, as exporters look for more details on the plans.
